Notes for Users of this document: Coding is more Phonetic in Baraha. Special care – Baraha coding uses ‘e’ and ‘o’ (in Sanskrit) for sound E and O. we have used capital letters as it matches with Unicode/general conventions in this document. ~g is nasal of ka varga (gna) ~j is nasal of cha varga (jya) H is visargam Vedic/Swara symbols – q anudAttam, # swaritam, 
$ dheerga swaritam, & avagraha,  ~M nasal symbol ^^ symbol represents letters separately without joining them when conjunct consonants are formed. ushmAn codes s, S, Sha (saraswati, Sankar, puShpam) Confirm corrections given for TA 7-8 Books are incorporated Kindly notify any major errors or inadvertent deletions to 
mail id- vedavms@gmail.com OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH SrI guruByO namaH, haqriqH OM 7	kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya AraNyakE prathamaH prapAThakaH 7.1	saptamaH prapAThakaH anuvAkaM-1 T.A.7.1.1 namO# vAqcE yA cO#diqtA yA cAnu#ditAq tasyai# vAqcE namOq namO# vAqcE namO# vAqcaspata#yEq namaq RuShi#ByO mantraqkRudByOq mantra#patiByOq mA mAmRuSha#yO mantraqkRutO# mantraqpata#yaqH parA#duqrmA&hamRuShI$n mantraqkRutO# mantraqpatIqn parA#dAM ~MvaiSvadEqvIM ~MvAca#mudyAsa(gm) SiqvAmada#stAqm juShTA$m dEqvEByaqH Sarma# mEq dyauH Sarma# pRuthiqvI Sarmaq viSva#miqdam jaga#t |

Uqrddhvasti#ShTha dhruqvastvam || sUrya#sya tvAq cakShuqShA&nvI$kShE | RuqjavE$ tvA | sAqdhavE$ tvA | suqkShiqtyai tvAq BUtyai$ tvA || iqdamaqhamaqmumA#muShyAyaqNaM ~MviqSA paqSuBi#r brahmavarcaqsEnaq paryU#hAmi | gAqyaqtrENa# tvAq CandaqsA &&cCRu#Nadmi | traiShTu#BEna tvAq CandaqsA &&cCRu#Nadmi | jAga#tEna tvAq CandaqsA &&cCRu#Nadmi | CRuqNattu# tvAq vAk ( ) | CRuqNattuq tvOrk | CRuqNattu# tvA haqviH |

prastO#taqH sAmA#ni gAya || yaju#ryuktaq(gm)q sAma#BiqrAkta#KantvA | viSvai$r dEqvairanu#matam maqrudBi#H | dakShi#NABiqH prata#tam pArayiqShNum | stuBO# vahantu sumanaqsyamA#nam | sa nOq ruca#ndhEqhyahRu#NIyamAnaH ( ) | BUrBuvaqssuva#H |

pRuqthiqvIM tapa#sastrAyasva | aqrcira#si SOqcira#siq jyOti#rasiq tapO#&si | sa(gm)sI#dasva maqhA(gm) a#si | SOca#sva dEvaqvIta#maH | vi dhUqmama#gnE aruqSham mi#yEddhya | sRuqja pra#Sasta dar.Saqtam || aq~jjantiq yam praqthaya#ntOq na viprA$H | vaqpAva#ntaqnnAgninAq tapa#ntaH |

piqturna puqtra upa#siq prEShTha#H | A GaqrmO aqgnimRuqtaya#nnasAdIt || 13 (10) T.A.7.5.3 aqnAqdhRuqShyA puqrastA$t | aqgnErAdhi#patyE | Ayu#rmE dAH | puqtrava#tI dakShiNaqtaH | indraqsyAdhi#patyE | praqjAm mE# dAH | suqShadA# paqScAt | dEqvasya# saviqturAdhi#patyE | prAqNam mE# dAH | ASru#tiruttaraqtaH | 14 (10) T.A.7.5.4 miqtrAvaru#NayOqrAdhi#patyE | SrOtra#m mE dAH | vidhRu#tiruqpari#ShTAt | bRuhaqspatEqrAdhi#patyE | brahma# mE dAH kShaqtram mE# dAH | tEjO# mE dhAq varcO# mE dhAH | yaSO# mE dhAq stapO# mE dhAH |

daSaq prAcIqrdaSa# BAsi dakShiqNA | daSa# praqtIcIqrdaSa# BAqsyudI#cIH | daSOqrddhvA BA#si sumanaqsyamA#naH | sa nOq ruca#ndhEqhyahRu#NIyamAnaH ||

apa#Sya~ggOqpAmani#padyamAnam | A caq parA# ca paqthiBiqScara#ntam | sa saqddhrIcIqH sa viShU#cIqrvasA#naH | A va#rIvartiq Buva#nEShvaqntaH || atra# prAqvIH | madhuq mAddhvI$ByAqm madhuq mAdhU#cIByAm | anu# vAm dEqvavI#tayE || samaqgniraqgninA# gata | sam dEqvEna# saviqtrA | sa(gm) sUryE#Na rOcatE || 22 (10) T.A.7.7.2 svAhAq samaqgnistapa#sA gata | sam dEqvEna# saviqtrA |

sa(gm) sUryE#NArOciShTa || dhaqrtA diqvO viBA#siq raja#saH | pRuqthiqvyA dhaqrtA | uqrOraqntari#kShasya dhaqrtA | dhaqrtA dEqvO dEqvAnA$m | ama#rtyastapOqjAH || hRuqdE tvAq mana#sE tvA | diqvE tvAq sUryA#ya tvA | 23 (10) T.A.7.7.3

Uqrddhvamiqma-ma#ddhvaqra~gkRu#dhi | diqvi dEqvEShuq hOtrA# yacCa || viSvA#sAm BuvAm patE | viSva#sya BuvanaspatE | viSva#sya manasaspatE | viSva#sya vacasaspatE | viSva#sya tapasaspatE | viSva#sya brahmaNaspatE | dEqvaqSrUstvandE#va Garma dEqvAn pA#hi || taqpOqjAM ~MvAca#maqsmE niya#cCa dEvAqyuva$m || 24 (10) T.A.7.7.4

taqM drAqviNa(gm)# hArdivAqnam | iqhaiva rAqtaya#H santu || tvaShTI#matI tE sapEya | suqrEtAq rEtOq dadhA#nA ( ) | vIqraM ~Mvi#dEyaq tava# saqndRuSi# |

mA&ha(gm) rAqyaspOShE#Naq vi yO#Sham || 26 (12) (rOqcaqtEq-sUrya#ya tvA - dEvAqyuva#M - draviNOqdA - dadhA#nAq dvE ca#) (A7) anuvAkaM-8 T.A.7.8.1 dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqvE | aqSvinO$r bAqhuByA$m |

pUqShNO hastA$ByAqmA da#dE || adi#tyaiq rAsnA#&si | iDaq Ehi# | adi#taq Ehi# | sara#svaqtyEhi# | asAqvEhi# | asAqvEhi# | asAqvEhi# | 27 (10) T.A.7.8.2 adi#tyA uqShNISha#masi | vAqyura#syaiqDaH | pUqShA tvOqpAva#sRujatu | aqSviByAqm pra dA#paya | yastEq stana#H SaSaqyO yO ma#yOqBUH | yEnaq viSvAq puShya#siq vAryA#Ni | yO ra#tnaqdhA va#suqvidyaH suqdatra#H |

sara#svatiq tamiqha dhAta#vE&kaH || usra# Gaqrma(gm) Si(gm)#Sha | usra# Gaqrmam pA#hi | 28 (10) T.A.7.8.3 GaqrmAya# Si(gm)Sha | bRuhaqspatiqstvOpa#sIdatu | dAna#vaH sthaq pEra#vaH | viqShvaqgvRutOq lOhi#tEna | aqSviByA$m pinvasva | sara#svatyai pinvasva | pUqShNE pi#nvasva | bRuhaqspata#yE pinvasva | indrA#ya pinvasva | indrA#ya pinvasva | 29 (10) T.A.7.8.4 gAqyaqtrO#&si | traiShTu#BO&si | jAga#tamasi | saqhOrjO BAqgEnOpaq mEhi# | indrA$SvinAq madhu#naH sAraqGasya# | Gaqrmam pA#ta vasavOq yaja#tAq vaT | svAhA$ tvAq sUrya#sya raqSmayE# vRuShTiqvana#yE juhOmi | madhu# haqvira#si | sUrya#syaq tapa#stapa | dyAvA#pRuthiqvIByA$M tvAq pari#gRuhNAmi ( ) | 30 (10) T.A.7.8.5 aqntari#kShENaq tvOpa#yacCAmi | dEqvAnA$M tvA pitRuqNAmanu#matOq Bartu(gm)# SakEyam | tEjO#&si | tEjO&nuqprEhi# | diqviqspRu~gmA mA# hi(gm)sIH | aqntaqriqkShaqspRu~gmA mA# hi(gm)sIH | pRuqthiqviqspRu~gmA mA# hi(gm)sIH | suva#rasiq suva#rmE yacCa |

diva#M ~MyacCa diqvO mA# pAhi || 31 (9) (Ehi# - pAhi - pinvasva - gRuhNAmiq - +nava# ca) (A8) anuvAkaM-9 T.A.7.9.1 saqmuqdrAya# tvAq vAtA#yaq svAhA$ | saqliqlAya# tvAq vAtA#yaq svAhA$ | aqnAqdhRuqShyAya# tvAq vAtA#yaq svAhA$ | aqpraqtiqdhRuqShyAya# tvAq vAtA#yaq svAhA$ | aqvaqsyavE$ tvAq vAtA#yaq svAhA$ | duva#svatE tvAq vAtA#yaq svAhA$ | Simi#dvatE tvAq vAtA#yaq svAhA$ | aqgnayE$ tvAq vasu#matEq svAhA$ | sOmA#ya tvA ruqdrava#tEq svAhA$ | varu#NAya tvA&&diqtyava#tEq svAhA$ | 32 (10) T.A.7.9.2 bRuhaqspata#yE tvA viqSvadE$vyAvatEq svAhA$ |

aha#r-diqvABi#-rUqtiBi#H | anu# vAqn dyAvA#pRuthiqvI ma(gm)#sAtAm | svAhEndrA#ya || svAhEndrAqvaT | Gaqrmama#pAtamaSvinA hArdivAqnam | aha#r-diqvABi#rUqtiBi#H | anu# vAqn dyAvA#pRuthiqvI a#ma(gm)sAtAm | tam prAqvya#M ~MyathAq vaT | namO# diqvE | nama#H pRuthiqvyai ( ) | 34 (10) T.A.7.9.4
